org.encog.examples.neural.gui.ocr

Class Entry

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.encog.examples.neural.gui.ocr.Entry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, Accessible

    public class Entry
extends JPanel
    Entry: GUI element to allow the user to enter a character by drawing it.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • downSampleRegion

        protected boolean downSampleRegion(int x,
                       int y)
        Called to downsample a quadrant of the image.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the resulting downsample.
        y - The y coordinate of the resulting downsample.
        Returns:
        Returns true if there were ANY pixels in the specified quadrant.

      • findBounds

        protected void findBounds(int w,
              int h)
        This method is called to automatically crop the image so that whitespace is removed.
        Parameters:
        w - The width of the image.
        h - The height of the image

      • getSample

        public Sample getSample()
        Get the down sample component to be used with this component.
        Returns:
        The down sample component.

      • hLineClear

        protected boolean hLineClear(int y)
        This method is called internally to see if there are any pixels in the given scan line. This method is used to perform autocropping.
        Parameters:
        y - The horizontal line to scan.
        Returns:
        True if there were any pixels in this horizontal line.

      • initImage

        protected void initImage()
        Setup the internal image that the user draws onto.
